06:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Broadcom Corporation BCM4322 802.11b/g/n [14e4:432c] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Belkin Dynex DX-NNBX 802.11n WLAN Cardbus Card [1799:d311]
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 64, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=16K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: b43-pci-bridge
